title: I-35E Dallas photos

pageHeader.title: Roadside Views North of Dallas
pageHeader.lastUpdated: Sept 12, 2020 (add photos); Dec 19, 2021 ($655 million expansion started)

text: The phase 1 expansion of this section of IH-35 was completed in 2017. Work on the second and final phase between IH 635 and the Bush Turnpike began in 2021. The construction cost is $655 million.

images.caption: Looking southbound at Luna Road. North of I-635, I-35E has 6 main lanes and 2 HOV lanes. Frontage roads are continuous.

imageStatus.note: Two reversible managed lanes were build in the center area of the freeway, opening in 2017. In 2021 work started on the the second and final phase, which will widen the freeway to 8 main lanes (4 each  way).

images.caption: Looking southbound along the frontage road at the Bush Turnpike Interchange.
Looking east from the west side of the  Bush Turnpike Interchange.
Ramps at the Bush Turnpike Interchange
Looking southbound along the frontage road, with the Bush Turnpike Interchange ahead.
Looking southbound at Frankford with a zoomed-in view, showing the Bush Turnpike interchange in the distance.

imageStatus.note: The addition of collector-distributor lanes was completed in 2017
The addition of collector-distributor lanes was completed in 2017

images.caption: Looking northwest (northbound) from the Frankford overpass, showing the collector-distributor lanes and two-lane reversible HOT facility which both were completed in 2017.

imageStatus.note: In 2017 phase 1 of the expansion program was completed, which reconfigured the main lanes in this area and completed the north half of the interchange.

images.caption: Also at TX 121, a zoomed-in view

imageStatus.note: In 2017 phase 1 of the expansion program was completed, which reconfigured the main lanes in this area and completed the north half of the interchange.

images.caption: Looking west at the ramps at the massive interchange at SH 121 (Rayburn Turnpike). This interchange was fully opened to traffic in 2018.
Looking west along the SH 121 frontage road.
